title: Ep 29: Beauty Favorites Under $30, Favorite Podcasts, and a grab bag of other listener questions!
itunes:title: Ep 29: Beauty Favorites Under $30, Favorite Podcasts, and a grab bag of other listener questions!
description:
This week we're tacking a grab bag of advice topics — we're talking everything from friendship to beauty buys to favorite podcasts. In other news, Becca had a Whole30 fridge fail, and Grace's face is falling off with the change of seasons. Plus, we're both embracing fall coziness and have some candle recs!

Can't get enough Bad On Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast

Sponsors:
